Key Match Events: Dinesh Karthik smashed a maiden fifty in Twenty20 internationals to help set up India's massive 82-run victory over South Africa
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will next head to Bengaluru for the deciding fifth T20 on Sunday
Others: India fast bowler Avesh Khan was the most successful with the ball for the hosts, making full use of the bounce on offer from the pitch to pick up 4-18
South Africa, who won the opening two matches of the series, got off to a horrible start in their chase when captain and opener Temba Bavuma retired hurt after suffering blows to his hand and body

Batting mainstay Quinton de Kock, who returned to the side after missing the last two matches with injury, departed soon after when he was run out -- leaving South Africa a mountain too steep to climb
